description:
Position Title: Data Developer
Location: Costa Rica

What you’ll do:

We are looking for a SQL/Looker BI developer who will provide business stakeholders with views and dashboards. Wind River has a data warehouse that we need to generate data and metrics for the entire organization. In this role, you will assist in the modeling of the data and the generation of business-driven metrics, illustrated through robust dashboards. Must be comfortable working with a wide range of stakeholders and functional teams.

Who You Will Work With:

The successful candidate will work and collaborate with the Finance data team to model and visualize data, based on requirements
The candidate will need to work closely with the DBA in the IT department for changes and updates to the Data Warehouse and/or databases
This position will report to the Sr. Director of Business Operations

Responsibilities:
Develop SQL code to generate views for visualization.
Develop LookML models for the entire company
Apply best practices with regards to SQL/LookML models, dashboards, visualizations
Work with cross-functional teams to gather requirements

Minimum Qualifications:

B.S. in Computer Science. Emphasis in Database is a plus
Strong SQL skills – 4+ years is preferable.
Data Warehouse experience is required. Snowflake experience is a plus
Experience with at least one of the following Enterprise System: SalesForce, Oracle, Oracle BI, Marketo, Anaplan, Adaptive
2+ years Development and visualization experience on one of the following platform: Tableau or Looker
LookML development experience is preferred
HTML development is a plus

Python development experience is a plus
Ability to communicate well across cross-functional teams
Passionate about data and contributing to the growth of a data driven organization

Why Choose Wind River?
Wind River believes that some things are so important they simply cannot fail. That is why we exist. Wind River software has been running the computing systems of the most important critical infrastructure that demand the highest standards for safety, security, performance, and reliability. Found in more than 2 billion devices, Wind River is pioneering edge compute technologies to accelerate the evolution from automated devices to autonomous systems. We have a spot for you!

description:
Role Responsibility:
Translate business needs to technical specifications
Design, build, deploy and maintain BI solutions: Data marts, reporting tools, etc.
Maintain and support data analytics platforms
Create tools to store data (e.g. OLAP cubes)
Develop and execute database queries and conduct analyses
Create visualizations and reports for requested projects
Develop and update technical documentation
Design and develop SSRS Reports and BI Dashboards
Utilize strong SQL Development experience to build efficient ad-hoc queries & stored procedures
Design, develop, implement, and maintain data models to be used by various reporting and data discovery tools.
Ensure that data is available to decision makers through BI tools that you and providers create, as well as self-service methods.
Explore and recommend emerging technologies and techniques to support/enhance BI landscape components.
Facilitate design sessions and synthesize requirements into consumable and reliable metrics
Propose impactful visualizations as needed and document reporting specifications as designated by the reporting consumer
Develop requisite reporting objects with device consumption flexibility
Ensure data quality of information powering your visualizations
Creates, maintains, and updates automated jobs to maintain proper functionality and health of BI systems.
Stays informed as to current industry trends and technologies, and recommends solutions accordingly.
Provide time / resource estimates for assigned projects.
Must be a self-starter, motivated, detail oriented, and have the ability to work collaboratively with others.
Job Requirements:
English 85%
3+ years experience as BI Developer.
Bachelor Degree, with a technology emphasis or equivalent experience
Background in data warehouse design (e.g. dimensional modeling) and data mining
Understanding of database management systems, online analytical processing (OLAP) and ETL (Extract, transform, load) framework
Understanding of Forecasting, Data cleansing and Transformations
Dashboards, KPIs, Stats
Familiarity with BI technologies. e.g. Microsoft Power BI, COGNOS
Knowledge of SQL, SQL Server Reporting Services (SSRS), SQL Server Integration Services (SSIS), Visual Studio, Microsoft TFS, SCRUM, JIRA
Analytical mind with a problem-solving aptitude
Detail Oriented with a strong analytical aptitude and ability to model data into information
Must be self-motivated with the ability to work alone or with others
Experience in delivering excellent customer service
Excellent skills in organization, prioritization, time management and multitasking
Attention to detail and thoroughness as well as a positive attitude are essential pre-requisites of the job.

description:
Opciones de Contrato: (medio tiempo - tiempo completo - por proyecto)
Locación: Curridabat, Costa Rica

Descripción
Estamos en búsqueda de Desarrolladores WordPress (Junior) para trabajar por proyectos para nuestra equipo en expansión para la cuenta de una Agencia de Marketing Digital Global dedicada a brindar servicios a empresas de tecnología en Norte América y Brasil. Formará parte de equipos ágiles manejados con metodología SCRUM, al lado de diseñadores, líderes técnicos y gerentes de proyecto localizados dentro y fuera de Costa Rica.


La persona escogida para el puesto se encargará de asistir a su equipo, parcial o totalmente, en la ejecución de proyectos de desarrollo web con WordPress. Se involucrará adecuadamente con cada proyecto y entrega, de manera que aporte soluciones al día a día del proyecto. Deberá tener facilidad de palabara, elocuencia a la hora de comunicar problemas, y actuará proactivamente para plantear soluciones, siempre velando por el bienestar de cada proyecto y su tiempo de entrega.

Asímismo, se buscan personas que les apasione el aprendizaje con cada proyecto, y que sean bilingues (inglés-Español) con al menos un 75% de nivel conversacional y escrito.
Responsabilidades
Reportarse diariamente para asignación de tareas y rendimiento de resultados con su Gerente asignado
Transformar diseños en plantillas HTML5 y CSS3
Implementación de diseños en WordPress
Personalizar la administración de WordPress con plugins de terceros y custom post types
Configurar temas de acuerdo a requisitos de cada proyecto
Instalar y configurar plugins - temas
Respaldar sitios y actualizar temas, plugins y versiones de WordPress
Brindar soporte al equipo del proyecto para tareas relacionadas con el desarrollo de cada proyecto
Documentar labores diarias en nuestro sistema de manejo de tareas según sean asignadas
Requisitos
HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript
Experiencia con sitios web responsivos
Manejo de WordPress (1-2 años)
Experiencia con page builders como WPBakery, Beaver Builder
1 año de experiencia en ambiente de agencia digital
Capacidad para trabajar remoto 2 días a la semana
Manejo de Trello, Slack, y/o Jira
75% de Inglés a nivel conversacional y escrito
Deseable
Experiencia con PHP y/o MySQL (1 año o + )
Manejo de Bootstrap
Sass & Grunt.js
Experiencia como miembro de un equipo ágil
Desarrollo de temas y o plugins, un plus!
Beneficios
2 días de Teletrabajo
Pago en dólares
Cursos de actualización

Bachelor’s Degree.
2+ years with front-end engineering, preferably in transactional businesses using A/B testing.

Intermediate English.
